author: PlayStation
description: Armored Core (1997), Armored Core: Project Phantasma, and Armored Core: Master of Arena are available now on PlayStation Plus Classics.
title: Gear up, pilots. When did you enter your first Armored Core?

author: PlayStation
description:
Become iconic across three weeks of modes! In Power Sword Royale, secure a Power Sword with its own specific abilities. Then have fun with Mozambiques for April Fools, play Solos in the final week, and conquer creator community challenges to earn rewards. Plus, check out meta updates with new Skirmisher perks and Alter ability updates.

Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play* battle royale game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5

Credits:
Production Company: Electronic Arts & Dark Burn Creative
Sound Design/Mix: Respawn Entertainment & Mass Audio
All other categories: Electronic Arts & Respawn Entertainment

*Applicable platform account and platform subscription (sold separately) may be required. Persistent internet connection and EA account required. Age restrictions apply. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game
title: Apex Legends: Beast Mode Event Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
title: Here's to 20 years following Kratos' journey Ω #GodOfWar

author: PlayStation
description:
Join us in celebrating God of War’s 20th anniversary by looking back at the incredible journey
Kratos has taken throughout the last two decades.

On behalf of everyone at Santa Monica Studio, we’d like to thank all of the fans who have
supported us over the years. You are the ones who have made it possible for God of War to
reach this milestone and we’re more grateful than we can ever express that you’ve given us the
chance to keep creating.

As a gift to the fans, all owners of God of War Ragnarök will get the Dark Odyssey collection at
no additional cost! This collection includes a brand-new update to the Dark Odyssey
appearance originally from God of War II, as well as various cosmetic armors, attachments, and
appearances.

Download the latest patch for God of War Ragnarök on PlayStation 4/5 or PC to get the
collection.

Thank you for joining us on this adventure!
Santa Monica Studio

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: Thank You for 20 Years of God of War - A Tribute to Kratos | PS5, PS4 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013284

Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark is the newest title in the Gal Guardians series of gothic-inspired 2D action-adventure games and set in the Gal*Gun universe.
 
Servants of the Dark greatly expands the setting from a single castle to the entirety of the Demon Realm, and further evolves the gameplay into a true metroidvania adventure. Starring two new characters with different playstyles, Kirika and Masha, players can switch between them in order to fully explore the vast areas and take down the dangerous enemies in their path.

Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark releases on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on March 27th 2025 (digital) and on PlayStation 5 on June 12th 2025 (Physical)

#ps5 #ps5 #ps4 #ps4games
title: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
